entries.meaning: A projector of a bright beam of light for use in theatres and studios; a flood
(chiefly in the plural) Powerful artificial illumination with a broad beam, especially in a series of units on pylons used to illuminate a sports ground.

verbs.description: floodlight (third-person singular simple present floodlights, present participle floodlighting, simple past and past participle floodlit or floodlighted)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To enlighten or illuminate with floodlight(s).
